entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 10:30 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023
